metadata.dc:author: Arbelo López de Letona, A
Prieto Bozano, G
Casado Flores, J
metadata.dc:description: Authors study public pediatric facilities in the province of Madrid during 1985. After analyzing children population, natality, ambulatory pediatrics, pediatric hospitals and services, they study rates of pediatric hospitalization, surgery, policlinics and emergencies. Conclusions on the negative facts founded are pointed towards modifications to be achieved.
metadata.dc:title: Asistencia pediátrica en Madrid, 1985.
[Pediatric care in Madrid, 1985].
